text.content:
Broken Weapon

Your weapon's current Hit Point are reduced to its Broken Threshold. If already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Broken]{Broken}, the weapon takes [[/r 3d6]] damage, ignoring Hardness.

Melee

My Spleeny Bits!

You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Wounded]{Wounded 1} or your wounded value increases by 1.

Ranged

Frustration

You take a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Effect: -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls]{-2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls} until the end of your next turn.

Unarmed

Beastly Rift

Your spell becomes a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Summon Animal]{Summon Animal} spell of the same level. The animal attacks you.

Spell
